page.title: 03Springfield Youth Club
page.content: {Springfield Youth Club}was started in 1979.It is held in the village hall on Tuesday and Wednesday evenings.There are 3 age groups 7_11,11_14 and over 14.Three Youth Club leaders are in charge.The most popular activity is trampolining which involves jumping up and down and doing acrobatics on a piece of canvas attached with springs to a metal frame.Pool is the next most popular game.It is played on a table covered with felt.The object of the game is to put the coloured or numbered balls into the 6 pockets at the edges of the table with a cue, which is a pointed wooden stick. Sometimes the Youth Club enter competitions against other Youth Clubs.There is also a yearly outing.
